name: Football Striker
description:
You get three runs for a goal. The opposing side get's three runs for a goal. Who wins?  Who knows. Choose your own team, learn the moves, win the awards, challenge your friends. Average game time is more like 90 seconds, (instead of 90 minutes). Your ultimate goal is to bring home the 1st League and the Cup silverware. In this game it's goldenware! Good luck!

This is as indie as a game can be. 

Currently for iOS only.
